resources.string: Click the button above to learn more about me :)
I am a software engineer with over 3 years of experience in engineering and programming.\n \nI specialize mostly in Android Development and also double up as a UI/UX designer

• Mobile Development 
• User Interface Design 
• User Experience Design 
• Writing

• Android Studio 
• Github 
• Figma 
• VS Code
Just a list of some projects I have worked on solely (Without collaborating)
An easy to use, simple music player with an elegant interface built with recent technologies and contains no ads
A modern news application which features virtually ALL recent and recommended android development tech stack and tools used in developing a performant, beautiful application.
A clone of popular social media app called snapchat, implementing similar design pattern and highlighting major destinations of the app
A clone of financial application called Branch International (branch.com.ng) showing close to perfect design pattern used in the original app

A simple currency converter app built with recommended android architectural pattern, best practices. This app uses most recent technologies, libraries and design pattern recommended by the android team. It is free, open source and hosted on my GitHub.
An E-Commerce App for Capital Land LTD (Company) that helps connect existing customers with the company. Verified customers can make purchases (In app payment), keep track of products ordered.
Some companies I have worked for over the few years as an engineer
As a software engineer, I worked with a team that builds several enterprise applications such as apps for commercial microfinance banks
Provided solutions for individuals, firms, organizations by giving them an online presence. Ran the I.T section of the company
Collaborated with other developers to help build an online community that helps you learn by bringing you closer to people who are interested in the same things as you
Feel free to reach out to me on any of these platforms
